column4: Someone HELP ME, ive bought a PC TV Pendrive Tv Tuner, it works on windows on ubuntu i cant watch, ive tried TV Time even VLC bUT THE settings arae so difficult
you sure it even has ANY linux support at all?
You would have to check for your specific tuner and see if it has linux support. Google/forums/hardware support list
If its supported.. it should work.. if its not.. then it wont.  Its possible it may get support  in the future. Its hard to tell  - it depends on the exact tuner/card/thing.
